q: What is the N60 Storm in UYA multiplayer?
a: The N60 Storm is a dual-barreled rapid-fire blaster pistol and the default starting weapon in multiplayer.

q: What kind of projectiles does the N60 Storm use?
a: It fires quick, low-damage energy rounds with moderate accuracy and slow projectile speed.

q: What is the effective range of the N60 Storm?
a: The N60 Storm is most effective at mid-to-long range.

q: How does the N60 Storm perform at range?
a: Its accuracy and sustained fire allow it to chip away at enemies from a safe distance.

q: What is the ammo capacity of the N60 Storm?
a: The N60 Storm has an ammo capacity of 500 rounds.

q: What are the main weaknesses of the N60 Storm?
a: It deals low per-shot damage and has slow projectiles, making it weak in head-to-head combat.

q: Why does the N60 Storm struggle against agile enemies?
a: Its small hit radius and low impact make it hard to land shots on moving or airborne targets.

q: What is the tactical role of the N60 Storm?
a: Itâ€™s mainly used for finishing off weakened enemies or destroying stationary targets like turrets and drones.

q: Is the N60 Storm good at close range?
a: No, it is outclassed in close-range combat by high-damage weapons like the Blitz Gun and Lava Gun.

q: How does the N60 Storm upgrade in multiplayer?
a: After 3 kill assists, it upgrades to the N90 Hurricane with improved fire rate and damage.

q: What are the improvements of the N90 Hurricane?
a: The N90 Hurricane doubles the fire rate and damage of the base N60 Storm.

q: How does the N90 Hurricane compare to other weapons?
a: It becomes more viable for suppression but still lacks burst damage and close-range power.

q: When is the N60 Storm typically used?
a: It is often used as a fallback when stronger weapons are unavailable or out of ammo.

q: How does the community view the N60 Storm?
a: It is seen as a weak starting weapon, mainly used for ranged harassment or cleanup kills.

q: What is the N60 Storm in UYA multiplayer?
a: The N60 Storm is the default starting weapon, a dual-barreled rapid-fire blaster with high ammo capacity and moderate accuracy.

q: How many rounds can the N60 Storm hold?
a: The N60 Storm holds up to 500 rounds, allowing sustained fire but balanced by low per-shot damage.

q: Is the N60 Storm useful in late-game situations?
a: It becomes less effective compared to stronger weapons but can finish off distant enemies or suppress opponents.

q: What happens when the N60 Storm upgrades?
a: After 3 kills, it upgrades to the N90 Hurricane, doubling its fire rate and increasing damage.
